no_command_data.desc: Oops! Looks like there's no JSON data for this command - I can't find a description.
usage: No JSON data - I can't find a usage.

prefix.desc: Changes the bot's prefix. Do `ax prefix ax` or `ax prefix default` to change it back to the default one. To see the bot's current prefix, do `@ProjectAx prefix`

createprofile.desc: Create a Project Ax profile, this is required to use almost all bot commands.

editprofile.desc: Edit a value of someone's profile. Values to change are; `age`, `first_name`, `last_name`, `gender`, `height`, `looks`, `world`, `district`, `friend_id`, `xp`

delprofile.desc: Deletes a Project Ax profile, *you can only use this command with ID*

die.desc: Shuts down the bot. Add a "pull" parameter to pull new changes from Project Ax's GitHub.
